content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Hello, Baihu Li. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in Munich to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. Let's indeed discuss the rental price. How much were you thinking of offering per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mister Heine. I'm looking forward to discussing the details. I'm flexible with the price, but I'd like to propose a fair rate considering the size and location of the apartment. Would you be open to starting at €750 per month?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Baihu Li, your offer of €750 per month is quite reasonable, given the size and location of the apartment. However, I'm looking to maximize my gains as a landlord, so I would need a bit more to consider renting the apartment to you. Would you be willing to increase your offer by €50 per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I appreciate your time, Mister Heine. Your counter-offer of €800 per month is also quite fair. I'm willing to negotiate further, but I would like to ask if there's any possibility of a lower price. Could we meet in the middle at €775 per month? This would be a good balance for both of us.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Baihu Li, your willingness to negotiate is commendable. Your offer of €775 per month is indeed closer to the middle ground. I'm willing to accept this price as it reflects a fair compromise. "I agree to the price of €775 Euro." Let's proceed with the lease agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine
